getNAV().details: Returns the latest Net Asset Value (NAV) of the fund.

getOffChainPrice().details: Returns the current off-chain asset price.

getOffChainPriceStatus().details: Returns the status of off-chain pricing.

returns._0: True if off-chain pricing is enabled, otherwise false.

getToken().details: Returns the address of the token associated with the fund.

setNAV(uint256,string).details: Updates the Net Asset Value (NAV) of the fund.

params.actionID: A unique identifier for the update action.

returns._0: True if the update is successful.

shareDividend(address,uint256,string,str.details: Distributes dividends to an investor while deducting an admin fee.

params._agent: The address of the agent initiating the distribution.
params._dividendIds: The unique identifier of the dividend distribution.
params._userIds: The unique identifier of the investor.
params.stableCoin_: The address of the stablecoin used for the dividend payment.
